title: NBA Playoff Talk & Next 75 Unveiling w/ John Salley | WHAT’S BURNIN | Showtime Basketball
itunes:title: NBA Playoff Talk & Next 75 Unveiling w/ John Salley | WHAT’S BURNIN | Showtime Basketball
description:
Big time WHAT'S BURNIN is here as the boys talk all the latest with the NBA Playoffs. Plus, they are joined by 4x-NBA champion John Salley as they discuss some of the biggest names in hoops that didn't make the NBA's 75 greatest list. Also they are joined by rising boxing star Jaron Ennis to discuss his upcoming fight!

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
